segments.text: Good evening , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to book a table for six tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , sir . We have only double tables left .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a pity . Can you recommend a nice restaurant near here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . In the middle part of the fifth street , there is a Phoenix Restaurant . Maybe you can go there .
segments.speaker: S1
